issue.title: Some headers ( ModelDatabase.hh ) are not exported when compiling from source v.2.2

content.raw:
That's strange; I see ModelDatabase.hh in the `gazebo/common` subfolder. With the deb installed, it's at:
~~~
/usr/include/gazebo-2.2/gazebo/common/ModelDatabase.hh
~~~
I see it in a similar location when installing from source.

It's included in the list of headers in [gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7b6a7251c3448b1083f0d0aba75cef2ab622f846/gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-75)

I see it in a similar location when installing from source.

It's included in the list of headers in gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt

content.raw:
Can you confirm exactly which versions of the deb you have installed, including operating system type?
~~~
$ dpkg -l | grep '^ii  gazebo'
ii  gazebo-current                              2.2.2-1~quantal                            amd64        Gazebo simulator - Main package
~~~
Also can you list the contents of your include gazebo/common folder?
~~~
$ ls /usr/include/gazebo-*/gazebo/common/
Animation.hh      CommonTypes.hh  Mesh.hh               Skeleton.hh
Assert.hh         Console.hh      MeshLoader.hh         SphericalCoordinates.hh
AudioDecoder.hh   Event.hh        MeshManager.hh        STLLoader.hh
Base64.hh         Events.hh       ModelDatabase.hh      SystemPaths.hh
BVHLoader.hh      Exception.hh    MouseEvent.hh         Time.hh
ColladaLoader.hh  Image.hh        PID.hh                Timer.hh
Color.hh          KeyEvent.hh     Plugin.hh             UpdateInfo.hh
common.hh         KeyFrame.hh     SingletonT.hh         Video.hh
CommonIface.hh    Material.hh     SkeletonAnimation.hh
~~~

And the one installed from source (with ubuntu 12.04 and gazebo 2.2.1) has  an extra one:
```

```

Very strange, I'll ask @\_jrivero_ about this.

issue.title: Some headers ( ModelDatabase.hh ) are not exported when compiling from source v.2.2

content.raw:
Here is my hypothesis:

The ModelDatabase.{cc,hh} files appeared sometime near to Nov 2013 in [this commit](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/557fa4b883ca49fa9c11004a0429706b6dbebf13#chg-gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt). In that commit, the ```CMakeListst.txt``` does not include the installation of ```ModelDatabase.hh```. This is why 2.2.1 and 1.9.x lack of this file.

Why is the file present in 2.2.2? Because we have [included it](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/3759a7098b6c73e2e01bf5b57dd23ae3d798c862) in pull request #929, dated on Feb 2014.

What to do? Fix 1.9.X branch and release.
content.html:
Here is my hypothesis:

The ModelDatabase.{cc,hh} files appeared sometime near to Nov 2013 in this commit. In that commit, the CMakeListst.txt does not include the installation of ModelDatabase.hh. This is why 2.2.1 and 1.9.x lack of this file.

Why is the file present in 2.2.2? Because we have included it in pull request #929, dated on Feb 2014.

What to do? Fix 1.9.X branch and release.
